title: Large Modern Two Bed-Heart Of Coolidge Corner, Garage Pkng, Avail-8/1!
posting_body: Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water, Water
Parking:: attached garage parking is available for rent
Spacious and bright two bedroom on the second floor of a modern elevator building in the Heart of Coolidge Corner, available 8/1!
This beautiful unit features hardwood floors, a recently renovated kitchen with a dishwasher/disposal, a large living room with space for a dining area and two very good size bedrooms.
Additional features include TONS of closet space, A/C and laundry in the building.
Rent includes heat and hot water and GARAGE parking is available for an additional monthly fee.
For further information and showings call Heidi at 617-699-4568.
